[[עַמִּים]] Is 2:3 +, [[עֲמָמִים]] (cf. BAram.) Ne 9:22; cstr. [[עַמֵּי]] 1Ki 8:43 +, [[עַמְמֵי]] Ne 9:24; pl. c. sf. v. II. [[עַם]];—(Thes cites foll. as

definitions.title: f.
definitions.body: [[וְחָטָאת עַמְֶָּ]] Ex 5:16 [but corrupt and unintellig.; read perh. ´[[וְחַטָאתָ לְע]], so LXX SyrVer Di]; Ju Jdg 18:7 [but [[ישֶׁבֶת]] must agree with lost word city, or the like, v. GFM]; Je 8:5 [but read [[שׁוֹבַב]] for [[שׁוֹבְבָה]] Gie]);—

a people, nation (sts. ‖[[גּוֹי]]), n. coll. (sg. Ex 21:8, Jos 17:14, Jos 17:15, Jos 17:17, 2Sa 17:29 + oft., or pl. Ex 20:15, Ex 24:2, Je 5:31 + oft., or both in same clause Ex 1:20, 2Sa 13:24): [[עַם אֶחָד]] = all mankind Ge 11:6 (J); peoples in gen. Ge 27:29 (J ; ‖[[לְאֻמִּים]]), Ex 19:5 (E), De 2:25, De 4:6 + oft. Dt, Ne 13:24 + oft.; [[קְהַל עַמִּים]] Ge 28:3 (P) an assembly (multitude) of peoples, Ge 48:4 (P), Ez Eze 23:24, Eze 32:3 (+ [[רַבִּים]]); one's own people Je 46:l6, Ps 45:11, Ru 1:10, Ru 1:15, Ru 1:16, Ru 1:16 + (on [[עַמִּי נׇדִיב]] Ct So 6:12 v. esp. Bu); particular peoples, Egypt Ge 41:40 (E), Ex 1:22 (E), Ne 9:10 +; [[עַם־אֲרָם]] Am 1:5; [[עַם־כְּמוֹשׁ]] (i.e. Moab) Nu 21:29 (JE), Je 48:46; but esp. Isr. Ex 1:20 (E) + oft.; ´[[עַם־בְּנֵי יִשׂ]] v:Ex 1:9 (J); called [[יהוה]] ´[[ע]] Nu 11:29 (E), 1Sa 2:24 +, and (by ´[[י]]) [[עַמִּי]] Ex 3:7, Ex 5:1 (J) + oft. (all periods); [[קְהַל עַם־הָאֱלֽהִים]] Ju Jdg 20:2, [[עַם־הַקָּהָל]] Le 16:33 (P), [[קְהַל עָם]] Ps 107:32; esp. [[הָעָם הַזֶּה]] (oft. in contempt or disgust) Nu 11:1, Nu 11:12, Nu 11:13 +; fig. of ants Pr 30:25, the shaphan v:Pr 30:26, locusts Joe 2:2, cf. [[לְעַם לְחִיִּים]] Ps 74:14 (where rd. [[לְעַם חִיִּים]] Hup-Now).—On Ju Jdg 1:16 v. [[עֲמָלֵקִי]].

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: inhab. of a city Ge 19:4 (J), 1Sa 9:12, 1Sa 9:13, Je 29:16, Je 29:25, 2Ch 31:4 + (Je 8:5 del. ´[[יְרוּוּשׁ]] LXX Gie Co Rothst).

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: inhab. of a locality Je 37:12 [appar. not = tribe, De 33:3 rd. [[עַמּוֹ]] LXX Di Dr, Ho 10:14, Ju Jdg 5:8, Jdg 5:14 rd. [[בְּעָרֶיְ]] We Now; v. sub [[ד]]].

definitions.title: c.
definitions.body: retainers, followers Ge 14:16, Ge 32:8, Ge 33:15, Ge 35:6, Ju Jdg 3:18, Jdg 8:5, 2Sa 15:17, Je 41:13, Je 41:14 +.

definitions.title: d.
definitions.body: people bearing arms 1Sa 11:11, 1Ki 20:10 +; [[כָּבֵד]] ´[[ע]] Nu 20:20 (JE), i.e. a powerful force; [[עַם הַצָּבָא]] Nu 31:32 (P), [[הַמִּלְחָמָה]] ´[[ע]] Jos 8:1, Jos 8:3, Jos 8:11, Jos 10:7, Jos 11:7 (all JE); so prob. Ju Jdg 5:8 a (fighting) band; perh. also v:Jdg 5:14 (rd. sg. ? v. GFM Bu).
= common people Je 21:7, Je 22:4, Le 4:27 (opp. ruler v:Le 4:22), Ne 5:1 (opp. [[יְהוּדִים]]), Ne 7:5 (opp. rulers).

people in gen., persons Ge 50:20 (E), so appar. ´[[כָּל־הָעָם אֲשֶׁר וגו]] Ex 33:16 (J), Nu 11:34 (J), Jos 5:5, Jos 5:5 (D), Ju Jdg 9:36 (as sg.), v:Jdg 9:37 (as pl.), Je 36:9; persons labouring 1Ki 9:23; superior persons Job 12:2 (iron.); [[עַם עוֹלָם]] Ez 26:30 people of long ago (now in Shₑ’ôl).

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: ([[עַמָּהּ]], [[עַמִּי]], [[עַמְְּ]]) [[בְּנֵי עַמּוֹ]] members of one's people, compatriots, fellow-countrymen, etc. Nu 22:5 (E), Ge 23:11 (P) Le 19:18 (H), Ju Jdg 14:16, Jdg 14:17, Ez Eze 33:2, Eze 33:12 +.

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: [[בְּנֵי הָעָם]] = common people (v.
) 2Ki 23:6, Je 26:23 +; people in gen. [[שַׁעַר בְּנֵי הָעָם]] Je 17:19 i.e. public gate 2Ch 35:5, 2Ch 35:12.

definitions.title: c.
definitions.body: [[עַם הָאָרֶץ]] the people at large, as a body 2Ki 11:14, 2Ki 11:18, 2Ki 11:19, 2Ki 11:20, 2Ki 15:5, 2Ki 16:15, 2Ki 21:24, 2Ki 21:24 +, Je 37:2, Je 44:21, Le 20:2 (H), Ge 23:7, Ge 23:12, Ge 23:13 (P); common people Je 34:19, cf. ´[[הא]] ´[[דַּלַּת ע]] 2Ki 24:14; disting. from prince Ez Eze 45:22, Eze 46:3, Eze 46:9, from priests Hag 2:4, Zec 7:5; = Canaanites Nu 14:9 (JE), cf. [[עַמֵּי הָאָרֶץ]] 1Ch 5:25; mixed post-exil. population Ezr 4:4.

definitions.title: d.
definitions.body: [[עַמֵּי הָאָרֶץ]] usu. peoples of the earth Jos 4:24 (D), 2Ch 32:19 +; of heathen peoples about and in Pal. after exile Ezr 10:2, Ezr 10:11; traders Ne 10:31; [[עַמֵּי הָאֲרָחוֹת]] Ne 9:30, Ne 10:29, 2Ch 32:13.

definitions.title: f.
definitions.body: [[בַּת־עַמִּי]] = people personif. Is 22:4, Je 4:11 + 7 t. Je + Je 6:14 (van d. H.; om. [[בַּת]] Baer Gi), La 2:11, La 3:48, La 4:3, La 4:6, La 4:10; [[בְּתוּלַת בַּת־עַמִּי]] Je 14:17.

definitions.title: h.
definitions.body: of foreign (non-Isr.) peoples: ´[[ע]] [[נׇכְרִי]] Ex 21:8 (E), [[אַחֵר]] ´[[ע]] De 28:32, and esp. from language, [[עִמְקֵי שָׂפָה]] ´[[ע]] Ez Eze 3:5 cf. v:Eze 3:6, [[כִּלְשׁוֹן עַם וׇעָם]] Ne 13:24 cf. Es 1:22, Es 1:22, Es 3:12, [[לֽעֵג]] ´[[ע]] Ps 114:1.
